Phobia recognized the pattern, the same signs of overconfidence and
megolomania (power-madness) displayed in former leaders throughout every
planets history.
 Phobia took a moment to think "When will they ever learn that a cannon can
destroy billions of lives. A single insect can avoid the blast, and carry a
disease with the same results"
Phobia again looked at his benifacter and realized he was no longer in any
position to bargain, being in the beasts lair is no place to challenge the
beast unless you know of another way out.
"Magmatron" Phobia said with a calm two toned voice,"Give me access to the
maintanance I need and I will work for you."
"Oh and one more thing,"Phobia continued to surprise Magmatron with his
tiresome, nervefilled tone."Nobody touches my ship, or parts but me."
